features: [BPAWA Microfiber Floor Mops for Home Cleaning]: This is a ultra slim and durable flat floor mop for floor cleaning comes with 4 high quality reusable washable microfiber mop pads and a practical scraper, which is a excellent household cleaning tool can be dry and wet used for quickly and efficiently removing dust, pet hair, and dirt, and debris from your floors. And it is a adjustable floor mop with long handle especially suitable for small spaces,such as living room, bathroom and kitchen.

[360°Rotating Slim Mop Head]: The microfiber mop for floor cleaning features a ultra-slim flat mop head that can be flexible rotated 360 degrees, which allows you to effortlessly wipe up all hard to reach areas in the house, such as deep corners in the kitchen bathroom or under the sofa, bed, cabinet and other furniture. The trapezoidal design makes the floor mop head easier to clean the edges and corners, which makes the floor cleaner mop a simple but convenient and effective cleaning tool.

[Lightweight & Adjustable Handle]: The hardwood floor mop comes with 4 pieces durable and lightweight ergonomic Aluminum alloy pole to compose mop handle, which make the microfiber mop length extendable and easy for both adults and kids to use without bending over. This slim dust mop has a maximum length of 150 cm (59 inches) and a minimum length of 81.3 cm (32 inches). It makes the house cleaning mop easy to clean not only floors and corners, but also higher window glass, walls and ceilings.

[Chenille Microfiber Mop Pads]: There are 4 premium machine and hand washable mop pads in the wood floor mop package, which are attached with strong velcro and can be used wet and dry for replacement. The reusable mop heads can not only quickly absorb water and remove dust, dirt, oil stains, hair and other dirt without leaving traces,but also can be used for a long time and will not be damaged and deformed. Newest blue Chenille fibers make these durable mop cloths even more stylish and flexible.

[Dust Mop for Hard Surfaces]: When combined with the multiple functions of the soft microfiber dusting pads and practical scraper,this dry / wet dust mop for hardwood floor cleaning can easily and safely handle all stubborn stains on most flat hard-surface floors and walls, such as hardwood, laminate, tile, wood, marble, stone, concrete, glass and even plank luxury vinyl flooring,etc. The mop cloths are soft and big enough so that its really safe for all the floors,no bruises and scratches.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BPAWA Professional Microfiber Floor Mop for Multi-Surface Floors Cleaning This is an ultra-slim but durable microfiber flat floor mop with 150cm adjustable long lightweight handle and 360 degree rotatable mop head, because of its advanced humanized ergonomic design, this wet dry mop is not only easy to install and operate,but also very flexible for superior quick and easy cleaning.

HOUSEHOLD CLEANING TOOL - DUST MOP FLOOR CLEANING SYSTEM Package Included: 1 × Ergonomic handle with hanging hole; 2 × Aluminum alloy pole detachable; 1 × Aluminum alloy pole with connector; 1 × 360° Rotating ultra-slim mop head; 4 × Reusable Chenille microfiber pads; 1 × Practical multi-function scraper.

REUSABLE MOP HEAD RIFILL KIT 4 Chenille Microfiber Pads Floor mop for hardwood cleaning provides 4 Chenille microfiber replacement cloths, which are super absorption, durable and economical, so that can provide excellent cleaning for your household work. The mop pads can easily attach to the flat floor mop head with velcro and remove for effortless. Floor Cleaner Mop Kit Upgrade long Chenille microfibers of the mop pads not only can strongly pick up hair and dust when dry used, but also lock in moisture and remove various stains when wet used. After that you can use the extra multi-function scraper to clean dirty, pet hair, hair and micro-particles on the cloth fibers. Reusable and Washable High quality microfiber cloths can be washed by hand or machine up to 500 times, they are the perfect replacement for money-wasting and resource-wasting disposable cloths. After being used wet and dry, multiple cloths can be washed together in machine to help you save more time and effort on cleaning.
PROFESSIONAL FLOOR MOP FOR MOST HARD-SURFACES

ROTATING MOP HEAD & ERGONOMIC DESIGN Flexible 360° Swiveling Mop Head The slim 360 degree rotation mop head of the dust mops for floor cleaning can easily reach to most of the narrow and cramped spaces in your kitchen,bathroom and living room,such as under the bed, sofa, closet, etc. Lightweight but Sturdy Extensible Pole You can adjust the length of the floor mop as you need by increasing or decreasing the metal poles, so the household cleaning mop can be used by anyone who who are willing to participate in cleaning work, even children. Can be Used as Wall Mop 59in extra-long and lightweight aluminum pole allows the dust mop for cleaning to be used not only to mop floors, but also to clean walls, glass windows, and even ceilings, that means you can use it as a wall cleaning mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tried a few until I found this one
reviews.reviewText: The BPAWA Microfiber Mops have completely transformed my floor cleaning routine, making it a breeze to maintain the pristine look of my hardwood floors, tiles, and other hard surfaces. This versatile cleaning tool has quickly become an essential part of my household cleaning arsenal.What sets the BPAWA Microfiber Mops apart is their thoughtful design and exceptional performance. The wet and dry capabilities of these mops make them incredibly versatile, allowing me to effortlessly switch between cleaning modes to tackle different messes. Whether it's a quick dusting or a thorough wet mop session, these mops deliver consistent and impressive results.The inclusion of four reusable and washable chenille pads is a game-changer. These pads effectively trap dust, dirt, and debris, making it easy to achieve a spotless surface without the need for harsh chemicals. Plus, the washable pads are not only environmentally friendly but also save me money in the long run – a win-win situation!The ergonomic design of the BPAWA Microfiber Mops ensures comfortable handling, even during extended cleaning sessions. The adjustable handle length allows for customization, accommodating users of different heights. Maneuvering around furniture and tight spaces is a breeze, thanks to the swiveling mop head that effortlessly glides across various surfaces.From kitchens to bathrooms, these microfiber mops have proven their versatility and efficiency time and time again. They make quick work of spills, pet hair, and everyday messes, leaving my floors looking polished and clean. The ease of use and convenience offered by the BPAWA Microfiber Mops have made them an indispensable tool in my home.In conclusion, if you're in search of a floor cleaning solution that combines practicality, effectiveness, and durability, look no further than the BPAWA Microfiber Mops. With their innovative features, reusable pads, and exceptional cleaning performance, these mops have earned their spot as my go-to choice for maintaining a spotless home. Cleaning has never been this satisfying and hassle-free!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently put in laminate vinyl flooring. The flooring isn't as 'smooth' as in my previous home so I needed to use a different kind of dust mop. Finally after trying a couple of other dust mops this one seems to work best. After each room or two I take the dust mop outside to clean it off and it cleans off easily. I have 4 furry family members and this mop seems to pick up the most hair. I'll only use this mop dry myself and I love that it came with extra washable pads. I also sprayed a tiny bit of furniture polish on the bottom of the pad. A+ from a very picky old lady!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was a good size and easy to assemble. It also came with an extra mop pad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Tool for My House
reviews.reviewText: I am amazed with this Mop. I have a 3 yr old toddler and my house gets very messy even after cleaning several times a day. This mop stick is so convenient that my son saw me using it once and has started cleaning any spills he caused.I am able to give a quick mop of the kitchen and living space every night and I wake up to a clean house. The spare pad are very absorbent and easy to clean. It is very sturdy and large and also comes with extra handle part to lengthen if needed.I recommend this product to any house, especial a house with children or pets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Floor Polish Applicator
reviews.reviewText: Bought specifically to apply floor polish. Absorbent enough to cover a fairly large area before needing more polish. Leaves a smooth application without tracking. Cleaned up easily when done. I'm pleased with it and would buy again, but with 4 covers, it will last quite a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The handle is long enough and easy to use. It is great you have a few other mop heads to trade out when having to clean the others.Picks up dust well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: I have used this mop several times in the short time I have had it. It works perfectly for what I was needing it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s nice and long which I did like but the center plastic bit broke immediately and the pole was always very flimsy even coming apart at times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to used and its washable. Good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this mop. It cleans well. The handle comes in segments so you can adjust the length. It is also good for other tasks such as cleaning shower tiling and windows. Very pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my go to mop now! It has made mopping my floors and walls so much quicker and easier. I have thrown out my other mops.+ Very effective at cleaning.+ Adjustable length, you can change.+ Easy to clean after use.+ Light and manoeuvrable.+ Great at getting right into corners.+ Assembly is very easy+ It is super light weight+ Pads are very absorbent and it is nice to get 3 in a pack+ Adhere very easily, and easy to take off+ Machine wash well+ Also makes a great duster!10/10 Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my go to mop now! It has made mopping my floors and walls so much quicker and easier. I have thrown out my other mops.+ Very effective at cleaning.+ Adjustable length, you can change.+ Easy to clean after use.+ Light and manoeuvrable.+ Great at getting right into corners.+ Assembly is very easy+ It is super light weight+ Pads are very absorbent and it is nice to get 3 in a pack+ Adhere very easily, and easy to take off+ Machine wash well+ Also makes a great duster!10/10 Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A very good mop! not a traditional one - but can be used wet or drygeneral purpose - can be used as a mop or dry to sweep up dustarticulates well and telescopic handlecomfortable and light and comfortable to holdwell made and pads are easy to remove and clean.Overall for the price this is an excellent general purpose floor cleaner
